exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable v.
Unable to find an instance for the variable u.
The reference eps' was not found in the current environment.

In environment f : R -> R -> R x, y : R eps, delta : posreal fp_neq0_loc : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps cont_fp_not_0 : f x y = 0 -> False u, v : R H1 : Rabs (u - x) < delta H2 : Rabs (v - y) < delta Unable to unify "False" with "Rabs (/ f u v - / f x y) < eps".

original: unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros cont_fp_neq0 cont_fp_not_0. unfold continuity_2d_pt in *. intros eps. unfold locally_2d in *. specialize (cont_fp_neq0 eps). destruct cont_fp_neq0 as [delta fp_neq0_loc]. exists delta. intros u v H1 H2. apply fp_neq0_loc in H1. apply fp_neq0_loc in H2. unfold continuity_2d_pt in cont_fp_not_0. intros eps'. specialize (cont_fp_not_0 eps'). apply cont_fp_not_0.
